newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's o/n rates close lower after brief rise.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's o/n rates close lower after brief rise.

text.p: Hungary's overnight interest rates closed lower on Friday after trading at slightly higher levels than on Thursday as the market prepared for March 10 tax-payments, traders said.
The overnight rates closed at 20.75 percent, down from Thursday's 20.875 closing. The rates moved between 20.75 and 21.125 percent, but most deals were struck at 21 percent.
"We already felt the wind of the tax-payments on the 10th (of the month)," said Commerzbank's Sandor Tolonics. "Probably this caused that very little rise."
Traders said the market was liquid and turnover was high.
